Simulating Utility and QALYs

Chosing a model structure

mod.struct <- select_model_structure(itreat_haq = "acr-haq",
                                     itreat_switch = "acr-switch",
                                     cdmards_haq_model = "lcgm",
                                     utility_model = "mixture")
print(mod.struct)
##        itreat_haq     itreat_switch cdmards_haq_model     utility_model 
##         "acr-haq"      "acr-switch"            "lcgm"         "mixture" 
## attr(,"class")
## [1] "model_structure"
